ref10 - implementation from supercop:
http://bench.cr.yp.to/supercop.html

sha3 - implementation from Keccak repository:
https://github.com/gvanas/KeccakCodePackage

    code: Snp\KeccakF-1600\Optimized64
settings: Snp\KeccakF-1600\Optimized64\ufull
  macros: Snp\KeccakF-1600\Optimized

ripemd160 - implementation of the ripemd160 algorithm:
http://homes.esat.kuleuven.be/~bosselae/ripemd.html
